entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Class fields missing in NativeAOT-generated PDBs (not visible in IDA or other debuggers) #115283
  • SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Http11_Cancellation_Test.GetAsync_CancelDuringResponseHeadersReceived_TaskCanceledQuickly hung in CI #115281
  • Optimization of modulo 7 in `DateTime.DayOfWeek` #115279

Closed

  • WSL and WSL2 test runs #42011
  • Debugger reports non-existent paths for extracted single-file assemblies #43336
  • X509Certificates.Tests.PfxTests.ReadSlhDsa_Pfx_Ietf_NotSupported failed in CI #115280

PullRequests

Created

  • Align SlhDsa API with MLKem #115290
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Smaller funclet prologs/epilogs (x64) #115284
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [mono][metadata] Defer class init for T when initializing T[]. #115278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [crossgen2] Prevent inlining of PInvoke marshalling accross version bubbles #115277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 136.0.7103.59, windows: 136.0.7103.49 #115276
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Mark CoreLib Internal.Console methods with NoInline #115282
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: refactor escape analysis to be more bv-centric #115213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm][aot] Fix op_OnesComplement on wasm and enable ceil/floor #115151
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Reenable AOT System.Runtime.Intrinsics/tests and fix problems that exposed #115204
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.6
  • Consider instruction input size when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix source-build validation leg #115272
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fold "X < NN && X >= 0" to "X u>= NN" #115240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix Metadata aggregator: removing cumulative sum for GUIDs heap offset #115268
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • GC Bridge for Android scenarios #114184
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify Span/Memory slicing exceptions #115275
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
